name: (ri)1 Spiced Rye Punch

ingredients.item: Demerara syrup (one part Demerara sugar, one part water)

garnish: 1 2 Lemon wheels and freshly grated nutmeg
preparation:
Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass, fill with ice and stir.
Strain into an Old Fashioned glass filled with fresh ice.
Garnish with 2 lemon wheels and freshly grated nutmeg.
